Original: Are you the [Guild] Guild that took
my request to search for Raht...?
Translation: Are you the [Guild] Guild that took
my request to search for Raht...?

Original: [Color:5]Are you the [Guild] Guild?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Are you the [Guild] Guild?[Color:0]

Original: Ah, just as I thought! I've heard a
lot about you from him. He said you're
some of his best friends...
[Page]
It might be odd to ask you this just
because of that, but can you help me
out this once?
Translation: Ah, just as I thought! I've heard a
lot about you from him. He said you're
some of his best friends...
[Page]
It might be odd to ask you this just
because of that, but can you help me
out this once?

Original: Oh, I'm sorry. My mistake... But you
did accept the request, right? Please
help him!
Translation: Oh, I'm sorry. My mistake... But you
did accept the request, right? Please
help him!

Original: This time, Raht seems to have headed
to the Cloudy Stronghold. He sent
this letter from there...
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃1:
I have finally reached the vibrant
green lands of the [Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
"But as usual, monsters attacked my
skyship, and it crumpled like a sheet
of paper in my fist.
[Page]
"But I won't lose heart. I can still
walk... And I have a carefully kept
map. I'm near a [Color:5]lake[Color:0] in area [Color:5]C-2[Color:0].
[Page]
"My adventure will continue so long
as I can still walk... Time to move
on! (Cont'd. in Adventure Log ＃2.)"
[Page]
"Walk"!? What is he thinking!? Please
find him and bring him back before
he makes things worse for himself!
Translation: This time, Raht seems to have headed
to the Cloudy Stronghold. He sent
this letter from there...
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃1:
I have finally reached the vibrant
green lands of the [Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
"But as usual, monsters attacked my
skyship, and it crumpled like a sheet
of paper in my fist.
[Page]
"But I won't lose heart. I can still
walk... And I have a carefully kept
map. I'm near a [Color:5]lake[Color:0] in area [Color:5]C-2[Color:0].
[Page]
"My adventure will continue so long
as I can still walk... Time to move
on! (Cont'd. in Adventure Log ＃2.)"
[Page]
"Walk"!? What is he thinking!? Please
find him and bring him back before
he makes things worse for himself!

Original: According to his letter, he crashed
near a [Color:5]lake in area C-2 in the Cloudy
Stronghold[Color:0]. You should start there.
Translation: According to his letter, he crashed
near a [Color:5]lake in area C-2 in the Cloudy
Stronghold[Color:0]. You should start there.

Original: Oh... he's already gone somewhere
else... Well, keep looking.
[Page]
Obviously, he can't fly, and he's not
a very good swimmer. If he was headed
east, there aren't many paths to take.
Translation: Oh... he's already gone somewhere
else... Well, keep looking.
[Page]
Obviously, he can't fly, and he's not
a very good swimmer. If he was headed
east, there aren't many paths to take.

Original: You found Log 3 this time? Oh, Raht...
Where have you gone...?
[Page]
Well, if he's moving around and trying
to avoid monsters, I'm sure he hasn't
headed for the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0].
[Page]
Maybe try taking a different route?
Translation: You found Log 3 this time? Oh, Raht...
Where have you gone...?
[Page]
Well, if he's moving around and trying
to avoid monsters, I'm sure he hasn't
headed for the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0].
[Page]
Maybe try taking a different route?

Original: You found Log 4...? Does that mean
my poor, stupid Raht went that way?
[Page]
Knowing him, I don't think he'd have
doubled back the way he came. You
should try heading [Color:5]south[Color:0] from there.
[Page]
Huh? Illness? What are you talking
about...?
Translation: You found Log 4...? Does that mean
my poor, stupid Raht went that way?
[Page]
Knowing him, I don't think he'd have
doubled back the way he came. You
should try heading [Color:5]south[Color:0] from there.
[Page]
Huh? Illness? What are you talking
about...?

Original: Ah, hello, everyone! Have you found
Raht yet?
Translation: Ah, hello, everyone! Have you found
Raht yet?

Original: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]

Original: Huh? Then... where is he?
Translation: Huh? Then... where is he?

Original: Huh? What do you mean?
Translation: Huh? What do you mean?

Original: Raht was that sick...? I see... So
he'd been hiding it all this time...
[Page]
But I can't stop there. Won't you
please at least tell me where his
skyship had crashed?
Translation: Raht was that sick...? I see... So
he'd been hiding it all this time...
[Page]
But I can't stop there. Won't you
please at least tell me where his
skyship had crashed?

Original: Won't you please at least tell me
where his skyship had crashed?
Translation: Won't you please at least tell me
where his skyship had crashed?

Original: All right... I'll send a search team
there. At the very least, they can
bring back his belongings...
Translation: All right... I'll send a search team
there. At the very least, they can
bring back his belongings...

Original: I'm sorry, but it sounds like they
didn't find Raht's skyship where you
told me to look.
[Page]
Can you double check the exact
location once more?
Translation: I'm sorry, but it sounds like they
didn't find Raht's skyship where you
told me to look.
[Page]
Can you double check the exact
location once more?

Original: Thank you. The remains of Raht's
skyship and his belongings were at
the location you told me to look.
[Page]
I wanted to at least return his things
to his home... I'll tell his mother
and father what happened.
[Page]
He... He always said an adventure
ends with coming home safely on
one's skyship... But...
[Page]
I'm sorry. The request is done now.
I let Ms. Kirtida know, so you can
get your reward from her.
Translation: Thank you. The remains of Raht's
skyship and his belongings were at
the location you told me to look.
[Page]
I wanted to at least return his things
to his home... I'll tell his mother
and father what happened.
[Page]
He... He always said an adventure
ends with coming home safely on
one's skyship... But...
[Page]
I'm sorry. The request is done now.
I let Ms. Kirtida know, so you can
get your reward from her.

Original: *sob* Raht... Why didn't you ever
talk to me about this...?
Translation: *sob* Raht... Why didn't you ever
talk to me about this...?

Original: Ah, you're back! Did you find
my Raht!?
Translation: Ah, you're back! Did you find
my Raht!?
